articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: NASA mission to get up close with Jupiter moon — the largest in the solar system - CNN
articles.description: Jupiter's moon Ganymede, the largest moon in our solar system, will be the subject of a flyby by NASA's Juno spacecraft on Monday. Juno will come within 645 miles of Ganymede's surface to take new images and gather data about the moon's composition.
